channel.title: Near reality Remake v2 before it went to $!@#
channel.description:
I decided to make a new ver of near reality since it has gone to shit so yea here is the download aka the forums
download : http://www.mediafire.com/?bjadyzc1b9w0ux5
Forums : www.pvpscape.lefora.com
For hunters : Item hunters are welcome as for staff hunters yall are not welcome if u beg for staff u will get ignored or muted! also Giving A rare whip if u join :) Just in my kind heart I do not accept people who beg for items i do not spawn and give u items nor do i sell items to reg players nor does the staff!
[size=18pt]There is a reward for getting players 3 people = donator status and 600 donator points! [/size]
owner : elite warior aka real name alex sponser admin : nikki admin : slip mod : aram drakonsky
If you need to contact the owner for anything just add him on msn mrrunescapefullrune@hotmail.com

item.title: Near reality Remake v2 before it went to $!@#
item.dc:creator: @Vazzily Vazzily
item.description:
@Vazzily wrote:

I saw the sponsor admin tag -> I figured you can simply sponsor/donate for a rank -> there is a high potential for abusive staff -> People will not join the server

I would think of disabling that option, otherwise your server is or might be a good idea.
